articles.description: The Indian government has signaled value creation in PSUs with regard to disinvestment, and thus, investors must pay attention to the cheaper part of the market, said Chris Wood of Jefferies.
articles.content: Famed equity strategist Chris Wood said investors must pay more attention to the stocks of Indian PSUs, citing Prime Minister Narendra Modi-government's focus on value creation. These public sector c… [+3421 chars]

articles.author: Shivendra Kumar
articles.title: F&O Ban List: Biocon, PNB among 12 stocks under trade ban on Friday - The Economic Times
articles.description: The F&O contracts of any stock enter the ban period when the open interest (OI) on it crosses 95% of the market-wide positions limits or MWPL. The ban on it is reversed only if the open interest falls below 80%.
articles.content: Twelve stocks are under the F&O ban list on Friday, February 9 viz. Ashok Leyland, Aurobindo Bharma, Balrampur Chini, Biocon, Delta Corp, Hindustan Copper, India Cements, Indus Towers, National A… [+2664 chars]
